item.description:

With this huge matchup being played on Saturday, it is also a great time to look at the from Winners and Whiners writer Eric Ploch on a very serious, and overlooked story… Read More »Lessons learned from Iowa student betting issues: Iowa vs Iowa State Prediction

The post Lessons learned from Iowa student betting issues: Iowa vs Iowa State Prediction appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.
item.content:encoded:
You can bet on the matchup for the Cy-Hawk Trophy between Iowa vs Iowa State this weekend with Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code WAWMETAGET.

With this huge matchup being played on Saturday, it is also a great time to look at the from Winners and Whiners writer Eric Ploch on a very serious, and overlooked story in the sports betting community.

The Lessons Learned from Iowa student Betting Issues

With the college football season quickly approaching with the rise of online betting across the country, a concerning issue in the state of Iowa has fans thinking what their favorite teams or players might be up to. Between Iowa and Iowa State, 15 total athletes, in addition to two student managers, have been charged with misdemeanors in relation to illegal sports gambling and records tampering, according to KCCI. Once seen as a forbidden space in college athletics, it has raised questions as to where else this happening, as well as how often.

Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code WAWMETAGET – Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets for any sport!

To Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets deal  here .

For Iowa State, it was shocking to see their starting quarterback involved, Hunter Dekkers, who placed 366 wagers since joining the Cyclones, including on a game involving his own team. One of the most stunning bets was from Iowa football player, Aaron Blom, who allegedly placed a bet on the under in a game involving his own team, again, according to KCCI.

For the Hawkeyes and Cyclones, questions remain as to the consequences of these actions, with Iowa State Athletic Director Jamie Pollard saying in the summer, “Iowa State cannot comment on any student-athletes’ circumstance or eligibility status. We will, however, continue to support our student-athletes as our compliance staff works with the NCAA to sort out questions surrounding their future eligibility for intercollegiate athletics competition.”

Get $250 in Bonus Bets today at Caesars Sportsbook by betting just $50

Claim Offer

Use Promo Code: WAWMETAGET

Disclaimer

Other schools will certainly be looking to do more diligence on the actions of their student-athletes as well, to avoid these issues in the future, especially as gambling continues to grow. It wouldn’t come as a surprise to see schools start to monitor the phones of their student-athletes or block certain sites within athletic facilities, while increased training and education is top of mind. While only a handful have been found to have done this, there’s little doubt that across the country, this is likely becoming a widespread problem.

The idea of student-athletes having a stake in things or having a leg up when it comes to information or a gameplan, would skew the lines. At what point does a player take a knee or run up the score, as fans wonder if there was an ulterior motive? It will be a challenge for athletic directors to grab hold of this situation, though with all the money involved in college athletics and gambling, this is an issue that needs to find its way to the forefront. Add in the potential embarrassment of those players involved and it’ll be interesting to see how this story progresses, not only in Iowa, but across the country.

College Football Expert Chris King has a full breakdown with his side and total predictions for the huge matchup between Iowa at Iowa State for this Saturday.

  • Iowa vs Iowa State
  • Saturday, September 9, 2023
  • Odds at Caesars Sportsbook Iowa -3.5 OU 36.5

Chris states: It’s safe to say that neither team was overly impressive on the offensive side of the ball in their respective openers. With that said, at least Iowa has their starting quarterback and a few playmakers on that side of the ball. McNamara transferred from Michigan to take over the starting job with the Hawkeyes and he was solid, though unspectacular, in his team debut. Iowa State failed to impress as they failed to score over the final 28 minutes against Northern Iowa. Without Dekkers or last year’s leading rusher, Jirehl Brock, who left the team as part of the investigation, there’s not a ton to get excited about with the Cyclones. Take Iowa in what should be a rock fight as they reclaim the Cy-Hawk Trophy.

Prediction: Iowa Hawkeyes -3.5

To read the rest of the article click HERE

Promo Code: WAWMETAGET

item.content:encoded:
Happy Friday! Mason Folz here and I have the Best MLB Player Props for Today and the Best Kentucky Sportsbook Promo Codes!

I’ve lined up three of my favorite MLB pitcher props with the odds according to Draft Kings, as I am expecting to cash in BIG before our weekend of NFL and College Football. All three of these pitchers have performed at a high level this season and I believe they have INCREDIBLE matchups today! Good luck if you are tailing, let’s have a great Friday!

Kentucky Sportsbok Promo Code for DraftKings: Get $200 in Bonus Bets. Claim right here!

 

Kentucky Sportsbok Promo Code: Get $200 in Bonus Bets

 

Andrew Abbott Over 5.5 Strikeouts (-160)

I will be hammering Abbott’s strikeout prop in this one, as he has recorded at least 5 strikeouts in five straight games and the Cardinals have continued to struggle on the road this season. They haven’t been extremely hot at the plate over their last three games either. They averaged 9.67 Ks per game in their last 3, as I see them struggling again in this one. Abbott has been solid all season and he’s going to show up in this one.

Take him to record Over 5.5 Strikeouts (-160)

 

Kentucky Sportsbok Promo Code: Get $100 in Bonus Bets + $100 Off NFL Sunday Ticket!

Claim Here

Taj Bradley Over 14.5 Outs Recorded (-175)

This is a MASSIVE game for the Rays and I expect Bradley to pitch deep into this game. He has also recorded at least 15 outs in four of his last five starts. He also picked up a win in his last start, as I see him picking up steam and starting to roll. It isn’t like Seattle has been this offensive powerhouse this season either. They only have the 19th highest team batting average, as I believe this game will be low scoring and tight.

Bradley will hang around and pitch long enough to record more than 14.5 Outs.

Yusei Kikuchi Over 15.5 Outs Recorded (-125)

I love this spot for Kikuchi, as I have been backing him a lot lately. He is 9-5 on the season and he only has a 3.63 ERA, as this Royals batting lineup doesn’t stand a chance. They have cooled down over the last two weeks and they still have one of the worst records in baseball. Yusei has also pitched for at least six innings in four of his last six starts. He’s been a reliable starter for the Blue Jays for the last month and a half and I expect him to dominate a poor Kansas City team in this one.

Take Kikuchi to record more than 15.5 Outs (-125).

Parlay Odds: +359

Yes, these picks might look a little bit safer today, but I promise you this is a great strategy when
setting up your parlays. If you can find three “Favorites” that you believe have a serious
advantage, then parlay them together, and let it rip! That’s exactly what I am doing today and I expect to CASH IN BIG! So, strap in tight and get ready to ride! Let’s have a FANTASTIC
Friday!

 

Kentucky Sportsbok Promo Code: Get $100 in Bonus Bets on Launch Day!

item.content:encoded:
The anticipation is under way as to when the North Carolina sportsbook promo codes will be available to NC residents.

Sports betting has been legal in North Carolina since March 2021, but is currently restricted to retail sportsbooks.   The North Carolina State Lottery Commission has until June 2024 to launch online sports betting, but many sports bettors are optimistic that January 2024 is a more realistic timeline.

Free Notre Dame at North Carolina State College Football Prediction!

  • David “The Dominator” Hess writes:

The Irish had a great defense last year, but an inconsistent offense kept them from competing for a national Title. Now they have a powerful ground game and one of the best QBs in the nation in Sam Hartman, so you can bet that the Irish will not take their foot off the gas here. They know that they have a shot at the playoffs and can’t afford to look past anyone. Notre Dame is off an easy win against Tennessee State, and they have just Central Michigan on deck, so there is no reason for them not to be focused in this one. Notre Dame has strong edges on both sides of the ball, and they have a massive edge at QB. The Defense will shut Armstrong down while the offense puts up enough to get a solid cover in this one.

  • Detroit Lions vs Kansas City Chiefs
  • Date: Thursday, Sept. 7, 2023
  • Time: 8:20 PM ET

WinnersandWhiners.com Expert NFL Football Writer Chris King states:

“Detroit was hot in the second half of last season but it will be a challenge for the Lions to go on the road in a hostile environment like Arrowhead to earn a win. The Lions have some holes that they hope will be patched up here but the fact remains that their secondary has a lot of questions at this point. Sure, this isn’t the Chiefs team of previous years where guys like Tyreek Hill were running free but they still have Patrick Mahomes. Plus, Andy Reid knows how to get the most out of the pieces he has to work with and that should be enough to help push the Chiefs to a home win in the opener.”

Prediction: Kansas City Chiefs -4.5

StatSalt.com Writer Craig Forde states: 

This is a game where I fully expect the ball to be flying from the jump. Two of the better gunslingers in the league going head-to-head to kick off the entire season and you can bet that they’ll want to put their arms on full display here. They’ll both also benefit from some thin defensive backfields to throw at. The defenses will need to be in the faces of the quarterbacks if they want to stop the pass, but both are also agile and capable of scrambling out of the pocket. The last time they met they combined to score 64 points. I expect something close to that again.

Take the over.

item.title: The Latest on ESPN Bet – What We Know so far in 2023
item.dc:creator: David Delano
item.description:
ESPN has taken a giant leap into the sports gambling world by signing a licensing deal with Penn Entertainment to launch ESPN Bet. Penn was thrust into the headlines when they bought Barstool Sports, until ultimately selling the company back to its original owner, Dave Portnoy. Penn had launched Barstool Sportsbook, but will rebrand to… Read More »The Latest on ESPN Bet – What We Know so far in 2023

The post The Latest on ESPN Bet – What We Know so far in 2023 appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.
item.content:encoded:
ESPN has taken a giant leap into the sports gambling world by signing a licensing deal with Penn Entertainment to launch ESPN Bet. Penn was thrust into the headlines when they bought Barstool Sports, until ultimately selling the company back to its original owner, Dave Portnoy. Penn had launched Barstool Sportsbook, but will rebrand to ESPN Bet after their newest partnership. Penn is scheduled to pay ESPN $1.5 billion over the next ten years as well as buy $500 million worth of shares in the operation.

Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code WAWMETAGET – Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets for any sport!

To Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets deal   here .

Disney and ESPN are continuing to move toward a direct-to-consumer model, and they believe creating ESPN Bet is giving the fans what they want. ESPN has begun to dive into the gambling world; they highlight the spread of games, air commercials for FanDuel and DraftKings, and have even created a show solely covering sports gambling called The Daily Wager. ESPN Chairman Jimmy Pitaro said, “Our primary focus is always to serve sports fans and we know they want both betting content and the ability to place bets with less friction from within our products. The strategy here is simple: to give fans what they’ve been requesting and expecting from ESPN.” The launch of ESPN Bet is the next step in the progression toward fully embracing the legalization of sports gambling.

Get $250 in Bonus Bets

Claim Offer

Use Promo Code: WAWMETAGET

Disclaimer

 

ESPN Bet is on schedule to be released in Fall 2023, with reports saying it will be live before Thanksgiving in an attempt to not miss much of the NFL action. The launch will include a mobile app, website, and mutually agreed upon retail locations. Penn currently has licenses to operate in 16 states – Arizona, Colorado, Iowa, Illinois, Indiana, Kansas, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Maryland, Michigan, New Jersey, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Tennessee, Virginia and West Virginia. The new merger will attempt to get into states where Barstool fell short, including Kentucky, North Carolina, and the highly sought after market in New York.

Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code WAWMETAGET – Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets for any sport!

To Bet $50 and Get $250 in Bonus Bets deal   here .

Potential customers should be on the lookout for enticing sign-up offers when the platform goes live. ESPN has great brand recognition, but will need to give customers an incentive to join in the flooded sports gambling market. Penn offered a $1,000 deposit match bonus with Barstool Sportsbook, so a similar promotion is possible here. There may also be offers for bonus bets, odds boosts, or first bet insurance as a way to create a new customer base. ESPN Bet will merge the biggest sports network with the hottest new trend in sports to the benefit of all fans.

 

It will be interesting to see how ESPN Bet measures up with other books like Caesars Sportsbook, Fan Duel, Draft Kings, BetMGM, and BetRivers. Each of these sportsbooks currently offers competitive odds, strong customer service and a variety of betting options. Check out the best sportsbook betting promos on Winners and Whiners!

Disclaimer 21+. Terms and conditions apply

 

Also do not forget to check out the Best Bets from some of the Hottest Sports Handicappers in the World!

Read predictions for Wednesday Sept. 6, 2023 here:

  • Detroit Tigers vs. New York Yankees

New York capitalized on the momentum it generated in its near-sweep of the Tigers in Detroit with a three-game sweep of the Astros in Houston. Can it continue its hot play at home? Read the free prediction from Michael Briggs here. 

The post The Latest on ESPN Bet – What We Know so far in 2023 appeared first on Winners & Whiners - Sportsbooks.

item.title: Thursday Night College Football Best Picks: Utah vs Florida

item.description:

item.content:encoded:
Remember you can always find the best College Football Betting Picks for this Thursday night, and everyday on Winners and Whiners! One of the matchups that our experts are dialed in on is between the Florida Gators and Utah Utes tonight!

Did you know that you can bet $50 on any College Football game today and get $250 in bonus bets by registering with Caesars Sportsbook promo code WAWMETAGET? 

Well, you can right here!

 

By signing up through the links on this page, you’ll be eligible to activate Caesars Sportsbook exciting Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets promo code offer for the rest of the College Football season and in time to coincide with the start of the NFL season.

 

New players can claim a Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets offer for any game for Tuesday without needing a Caesars Sportsbook promo code. Simply click here to get started and Bet on tonight’s Utah vs Florida game!

 

  • Florida Gators vs Utah Utes
  • Date: Thursday, August 31, 2023
  • Time: 8:00 PM ET
  • Key Trends: 
  • The over is cashed in 15 of Florida’s last 22 road games
  • Utah is 15-1 straight up in its last 16 home games

Expert College Football Writer Dave Kovaleski states: 

The Utah Utes are loaded once again!

The Utah Utes began the 2022 season the same way they are beginning this one, with a game against Florida. Utah was a preseason top-10 team last season and was favored in that game, but the Gators came away with a 29-26 upset win. Utah went on to win 10 of their next 13 games after that to finish 10-4 while Florida struggled and finished below .500. Utah is once again ranked in the top 20 in the preseason polls this season, ranked No. 14.

Get the rest of the FREE PICK for today’s Utah vs Florida game here! 

Use Caesars Sportsbook Promo Code WAWMETAGET – Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets for College Football action on Thursday August 31! 

In order to redeem this offer from Caesars Sportsbook, one of the biggest online sports betting sites in the USA, simply click or tap on any of the links on this page to immediately unlock the Bet $50, Get $250 in Bonus Bets promo. Also, use the WinnersandWhiners promo code WAWMETAGET when you sign up.

Caesars Sportsbook is available in the following states: AZ, CO, CT, IA, IN, KS, LA, MA, MD, MI, NJ, NY, OH, PA, TN, VA, WV, and WY.

Winners and Whiners Expert Handicapper David Delano also has thoughts on tonight’s marquee match!
